descript.abstract: [Metadata] Description: Surface Water Hyrdrologic Unit Boundaries (Watersheds) for the 8 major Hawaiian Islands.Source: GDSI, 1995, 1999; State of Hawaii Commission on Water Resource Management (CWRM), 2008. Updated, August 2022. Note: The Hawaii Statewide GIS Program was notified in February 2023 that some values for the area_sqmi field were incorrect. GIS staff corrected the errors and republished the layer, March 2, 2023. Updated Jan/Feb 2024: Modified boundaries of several hydrologic units; added several new attributes, see full metadata for more information.For additional information, please refer to complete metadata at https://files.hawaii.gov/dbedt/op/gis/data/watersheds_cwrm.pdf or contact Hawaii Statewide GIS Program, Office of Planning and Sustainable Development, State of Hawaii; PO Box 2359, Honolulu, Hi. 96804; (808) 587-2846; email: gis@hawaii.gov; Website: https://planning.hawaii.gov/gis.
descript.purpose: Watershed Unit Boundaries for the major Hawaiian Islands.

idinfo.useconst:
State of Hawaii Terms of Use.
The contents of this web page are public domain and to the extent indicated otherwise in the Terms of Use, are exempt from Terms of Use policy restrictions. There are no expressed warranties associated with the release of this data or product. Specifically, no warranty is made that the GIS data, or any subsequent updates will be error free and no warranty is made regarding the positional or thematic accuracy of the GIS data. The GIS data and any features depicted do not represent or confer any legal rights, privileges, benefits, boundaries or claims of any kind. The Office of Planning and Sustainable Development encourages users to report any discrepancies or errors found. Contact: Hawaii Statewide GIS Program, Office of Planning and Sustainable Development, State of Hawaii; PO Box 2359, Honolulu, Hi. 96804; (808) 587-2846; email: gis@hawaii.gov. Website: https://planning.hawaii.gov/gis.
